unit_name,
status,

supplier_id,
enterprise_id,

extend,
create_time,
update_time,
) VALUES (

#{productId},

#{categoryId},

mapper.update:
UPDATE channel_product
channel_code = #{channelCode},
product_id = #{productId},
chinese_name = #{chineseName},
category_id = #{categoryId},
category_pid = #{categoryPid},
category_f_pid = #{categoryFPid},
brand_id = #{brandId},
category_tree_node_id = #{categoryTreeNodeId},
title = #{title},
name = #{name},
goods_type = #{goodsType},
brand_name = #{brandName},
goods_level = #{goodsLevel},
market_price = #{marketPrice},
price = #{price},
tax_no = #{taxNo},
ean_no = #{eanNo},
place_of_origin = #{placeOfOrigin},
country_name = #{countryName},
calculation_unit = #{calculationUnit},
unit_name = #{unitName},
status = #{status},
product_details = #{productDetails},
supplier_id = #{supplierId},
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId},
platform_id = #{platformId},
commodity_template_id = #{commodityTemplateId},
price_detail = #{priceDetail},
referlink = #{referlink},
extend = #{extend},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
